endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: The image file format of the generated output images

parameters.description: The image file format of the generated output images

parameters.name: max_batch_size

param_schema.title: Max Batch Size
param_schema.description: Maximum number of tiles to process in a single batch. Higher values may increase speed but require more GPU memory.

parameters.description: Maximum number of tiles to process in a single batch. Higher values may increase speed but require more GPU memory.

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: The image compression quality (for lossy formats like JPEG and WebP). 100 = best quality, 0 = lowest quality.

parameters.description: The image compression quality (for lossy formats like JPEG and WebP). 100 = best quality, 0 = lowest quality.
